course_description: This course empowers students with practical skills for leading congregations financially. Students in this course will develop competence in best practices of church budgeting and accounting, while engaging the specific governing documents of students' home congregations and denominations. Through real-life examples and exercises students will learn how to lead and manage congregational finances more effectively and ethically.
